title: In Honor Of The Old Giant Enemy Crabgot Splash
body: Can we have the damsel in distress somewhere on the boat in the new splash? Similar to how lollipoppy and armor of the fifth age Taric kept something from their infamous splashes. Maybe have her lookin up at him and giving a King Kong feel where the beast has an infatuation with the beautiful lady or maybe have her simply scream in horror. Just something small to commemorate the gem that was Crabgot.

replies.body: I think Victor actually painted one in on the bow for that exact reason.
Wow! Thanks for replying. However, I don't really see it. Maybe I'm just blind. Lol
We were laughing a little because yeah the boat is so small it's barely visible, but we felt it was important for players to know she's still there.
we shall make a skin called **God Fist TheySeeMeWardin**

Tell Victor he did a great job!
Seriously, that splash is so bloody awesome :P
